name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ生誕祭2025 】超重大発表あり！Sincerely,Towa【 3DLIVE 】 [I4FbpwMb78U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'S.T.Y.' by Tokoyami Towa.
Transition and interlude with audience shots and instrumental music.
Performance of the song 'Present Day' by Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: ...塗り潰しちゃって
subtitles.english: ...Paint over it all.

subtitles.original: 大失敗も後悔さえ愛せるなら
subtitles.english: If I can love even my greatest failures and regrets,

subtitles.original: 背中には君という羽
subtitles.english: I'll have wings known as "you" on my back.

subtitles.original: チックタック追い越して いつもどこか乾いた焦燥感
subtitles.english: Overtaking the tick-tock, always feeling a parched sense of impatience.

subtitles.original: 隣で走る君と 織りなすレゾナンスストーリー
subtitles.english: A resonance story woven together with you running beside me.

subtitles.original: 君の色が私を塗り替えて
subtitles.english: Your colors repaint me,

subtitles.original: 壊れかけの音で響くから
subtitles.english: Because they resonate with a half-broken sound.

subtitles.original: お伽話の続きをまだ描きたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I still want to draw the continuation of the fairy tale.

subtitles.original: 連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you with me.

subtitles.original: (Vocalizing)
subtitles.english: (Vocalizing)

subtitles.original: Always going
subtitles.english: Always going

subtitles.original: 何全回何万回迷い込んでも
subtitles.english: No matter how many thousands or tens of thousands of times I get lost,

subtitles.original: 最大級 I love you な君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because I have you, whom I love to the maximum degree.

subtitles.original: 本日スペシャルな Thank you さぁ手を持って
subtitles.english: A special "Thank you" for today, now take my hand.

subtitles.original: 運命も手繰り寄せて
subtitles.english: And pull even destiny towards us.

subtitles.original: もうバイバイも涙も忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget the goodbyes or the tears anymore.

subtitles.original: 止められなかった私のこの背中には
subtitles.english: On this back of mine that couldn't be stopped,

subtitles.original: 君という羽
subtitles.english: Are wings known as "you."

subtitles.original: 描いた未来の景色がここにある
subtitles.english: The scenery of the future I drew is right here.

subtitles.original: 弱さも抱きしめていくから
subtitles.english: Because I'll keep embracing even my weaknesses.

subtitles.original: 広げた翼が輝いていく
subtitles.english: The wings I've spread are starting to shine.

subtitles.original: 旅立て明日
subtitles.english: Set out for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 等身大の私を映してたい ただ
subtitles.english: I just want to reflect my true self.

subtitles.original: 望む瞬間衝動になってんだ くだらないとさ
subtitles.english: The moment I desire it, it becomes an impulse. They say it's trivial.

subtitles.original: 曇りきっていく目をして
subtitles.english: With eyes that are becoming completely clouded,

subtitles.original: 可能性だって夢を見てみたいのに
subtitles.english: I want to try and see the dream of possibilities.

subtitles.original: ずっとわかっていたんだけど 言葉は浮いてる対象に
subtitles.english: I've known it all along, but words are just floating targets.

subtitles.original: 大袈裟だって思ってるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You think I'm exaggerating, don't you?

subtitles.original: ずっと黙っていたんだけど 心ってやっぱ正直だ
subtitles.english: I've been keeping quiet, but the heart is honest after all.

subtitles.original: 打ち明けたい訳、感じ気がしてる
subtitles.english: I feel like I have a reason to confide.

subtitles.original: ここだよ響かせて
subtitles.english: I'm right here, make it resonate.

subtitles.original: 掲げた鼓動で 描くの... 終わらないでしょう
subtitles.english: Drawing with the heartbeat I've held up... it won't end, right?

subtitles.original: 灯になっていく
subtitles.english: It's becoming a light.

subtitles.original: 何度も奪われ繰り返し 意志の傷痕に
subtitles.english: Repeatedly robbed, on the scars of my will,

subtitles.original: 誓った
subtitles.english: I made a vow.

subtitles.original: 失敗後悔は泣いて溜息の音がしてる
subtitles.english: Failures and regrets are crying, making the sound of a sigh.

subtitles.original: 現状に不満はない 飲み込んだ気でいたんだ
subtitles.english: I have no complaints with the status quo. I thought I'd swallowed it all.

subtitles.original: 泡、忘れないように
subtitles.english: So as not to forget the fleeting bubbles,

subtitles.original: 降臨祭 もう汚されないように
subtitles.english: Advent festival, so that I won't be tainted anymore.

subtitles.original: もっと笑っていたいんだもん 大人になっていく代償に
subtitles.english: Because I want to smile more, as a price for becoming an adult.

subtitles.original: あなただってきっと思ってるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You're probably thinking the same thing, aren't you?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと分かっていたんだけど 心ってやっぱ正直だ
subtitles.english: I understood it well, but the heart is honest after all.

subtitles.original: 失せなくなった痛みを 感じ気がしてる
subtitles.english: I feel the pain that won't go away.

subtitles.original: 照らされたこの場所で
subtitles.english: In this place that's lit up,

subtitles.original: 咲かせた手ほら 描くの... 終わらないでしょう
subtitles.english: Look at the hand I've made bloom, drawing... it won't end, right?

subtitles.original: 我儘待っている
subtitles.english: Selfishness is waiting.
